title: To keep the faith
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and Pat Kavanagh
brief_description: A religious documentary with commentary by Francis James. Illustrates the enormous cultural influence of the orthodox church over eastern Europe. Raises the issue of the cultural flux generations of immigrant families find themselves in.
description: A religious documentary with commentary by Francis James. Illustrates the enormous cultural influence of the orthodox church over eastern Europe. Raises the issue of the cultural flux generations of immigrant families find themselves in.
